page.title: 01Chapel Information.
page.content: {LOCAL AUTHORITY:}Chapel St.Leonards Parish Council. Clerk: Mr. E. Ingham, 16 Clarendon Road, Skegness. {POPULATION:}Approximately 2000(summer visiting 50000) {POLICE:}The Police House is within 100 metres of Tylers Bridge. Tel.Skegness 72222 {WEATHER: }Chapel is one of the sunniest resorts on the east coast. The rainfall is well below the country's average. {BUS SERVICE: }The Lincolnshire Road Car Bus service runs through the resort. Number 590 runs from Skegness to Mablethorpe via Chapel. There is alsoa direct service to and from Nottingham via Mablethorpe.
